SummaryEnglish: Valt Aoi, who participated in the Japanese Championship, was scouted for the prestigious Spanish team "BC Sol" and heads out to Spain. With their sights set on the world, Valt and his friends begin their challenge for the World League! However, in order to qualify for the World League, they must first win the European League. Will Valt be able to take BC Sol to the World League? And can he defeat the world's strongest Bladers? Valt's story of fierce battling and growth begins as he sets his sights to the top of the world!
Aliases: ベイブレードバーストGT (ガチ)
ベイブレードバースト 超ゼツ
ベイブレードバースト スパーキング
ベイブレードバースト 神〈ゴッド〉

1.SummaryEnglish: Valt, who loves Beyblade, is invited to compete in a Beyblade tournament by his close friend Shu. In the first match of the local tournament, is it possible for Valt to win?

2.TitleEnglish: Kerbeus: Guard Dog of the Underworld!
2.SummaryEnglish: Valt has emerged as the winner of his first round at the local tournament! Shu finds himself shocked that the battle against The Boss ended with a Burst Finish. While Valt excites himself to begin his intensive training, he is invited by Nika and Tokonatsu to see a puppet show. But the contents of the puppet show was slightly unusual. And, as the second round of the local tournament begins, the opponent facing Valt is Kensuke Midorikawa, the puppet-controlling Blader.

3.SummaryEnglish: The match between Valt and Kensuke reaches its third battle. However, Valt is overcome by his nerves and ends up dropping Valkyrie. The ones appearing before Valt to pick up his Valkyrie are none other than Kensuke's puppets, Ker and Beus and, at that moment, Valt remembers that...? Finally, the match between Valt and Kensuke concludes! Who is the winner!?

4.SummaryEnglish: Valt is excited to start a Beyblade club at school, naming himself club captain; his first challenge is to convince others to join.

5.SummaryEnglish: Valt's next opponent is Daina Kurogami. Kensuke has a bad feeling about Daina's provocation before the match. His bad feelings were correct, as Valt's Rush Shoot is completely nullified in this match. As Daina provokes him more and more, Valt becomes unable to perform a Rush Shoot at all..!?

6.SummaryEnglish: At the Regionals, Shu and Wakiya continue to win against strong rivals one after the other. Besides that, Boss and the others tell Valt his weakpoint that he gets heated up too easily. Valt then starts special training to try and fix it, but fails constantly... However, in Valt's Failed Shoots, Daina realizes something...?

7.TitleEnglish: The Flash Launch! It's Crazy Fast!
7.SummaryEnglish: Valt is suffering from his inability to use his Special Move. However, some advice from Shu inspires Valt to create a new Special Move, so he undergoes special training. Furthermore, facing his next opponent, the intensity of the battle puts Valt in a troubling situation...

8.SummaryEnglish: Hoji's Horusood uses it's Special Move, which utilises Horusood's unique features. As other rivals intently watch these two battle, why is Valt still smiling?!

9.SummaryEnglish: Orochi Ginba helps Nika, who got lost. Orochi, who is said to have a divine hearing, finds himself interested in the sound that Valt's launches create. Furthermore, Wakiya, who has started taking an interest in Valt, lures him out by ordering a delivery of bread and forcefully begins a battle!

10.TitleEnglish: Get Over It! Trust in Valtryek!
10.SummaryEnglish: After being overwhelmed by Wakiya, Valt falls into a slump. Rantaro, who is worried about Valt, suggests that they have some battles for a change of pace. But, as Valt continues to be defeated in the battles, he starts to isolate himself in his room. And then, while walking down a street, Orochi sees Shu coming out of a hospital...!

11.SummaryEnglish: Valt finds out about Shu's predicament as the semi-finals are about to begin

12.SummaryEnglish: Valt's battle against Wakiya continues; Shu takes on Orochi Ginba.

13.SummaryEnglish: Orochi starts to lose his cool in the battle against Shu; Valt gears up for the district tournament final but soon discovers just how severe Shu's injury is.

14.SummaryEnglish: Valt is stuck between following through with a promise and protecting his friend and he has to make a tough decision.

15.TitleEnglish: A Fierce Battle! Valtryek Versus Spryzen!
15.SummaryEnglish: The District Tournament Final heats up, pitting Valt's fierce Flash Launch against Shu's new Upper Launch.

16.SummaryEnglish: On a trip to Xander's village, the gang finds it to be full of ninja traps and interesting characters.

17.SummaryEnglish: Xander shows off his skills with Xcalius; the team tries to keep up with his intense training regimen.

18.TitleEnglish: Team Battle! It's Off the Hook!
18.SummaryEnglish: A hidden member of Xander's team is revealed.

19.SummaryEnglish: Rantaro takes on Ukio in the team battle; Ken has something important to reveal.

20.SummaryEnglish: Ken takes on the Sword Flames and with new found determination and his friends behind him, Ken appears more powerful than ever before.

21.SummaryEnglish: Just before a match, Ken is rattled by Xander and his powerful new technique; Valt's must face Xander in a three-point match.

22.SummaryEnglish: The Beigoma team is given a second chance to enter the National Tournament; Valt faces Ukio in his first match and manages to pull off something extraordinary.

23.SummaryEnglish: The pressure of the tournament is making Daigo nervous about his upcoming match against Yugo; Rantaro and Hoji find out that they'll have to take on their close friends next.

24.SummaryEnglish: A poorly-disguised Blader starts making an appearance in the Beyblading world; Rantaro and Hoji find themselves in the same practice space.

25.SummaryEnglish: The ever outrageous Zac the Sunrise, disguised as the Masked Blader, gets to know Toko and Nika; Zac challenges Wakiya to a battle; Rantaro delivers terrible news to Valt.

26.SummaryEnglish: A guilty Daigo makes amends; Valt must find a way to beat Orochi in the A-block finals if he is to score an invitation to Nationals.

27.SummaryEnglish: With Wakiya joining the Beyclub, the team travels to his cabin for a training retreat.

28.TitleEnglish: Mountains! Rivers! A Huge Stormy Adventure!
28.SummaryEnglish: While the team trains at Wakiya's cabin, Toko and Nika become lost.

29.SummaryEnglish: Valt is chosen to be in the opening ceremony of the National Tournament; Valtryk's gone missing.

30.SummaryEnglish: Beigoma Club battles against Ice Blaze in the first round of the Nationals.

31.SummaryEnglish: After losing his battle to Quon Limon, a discouraged Valt tries to reconnect with Valtryek.

32.SummaryEnglish: Zac invites the Beigoma team to a theme park where they meet the most powerful Blader in the country.

33.SummaryEnglish: The Club faces the Sword Flames in the second round; Wakiya challenges Valt's leadership.

34.SummaryEnglish: Valt and Ken practice together and discover a new power in Valtryek.

35.SummaryEnglish: The Beigoma Academy Bey Club comes up with a strategy to take down the Beasts; Valtryek gives Valt a boost.

36.SummaryEnglish: Zac and Gabe battle; the Beigoma Academy Bey Club is the subject of a video documentary; Valt makes a rival.

37.SummaryEnglish: The team picks an unusual way to train.

38.TitleEnglish: Battle to the Finish! Lost Luinor!
38.SummaryEnglish: The Beigoma Beyclub and Rideout collide at the National Team Finals.

39.SummaryEnglish: The showdown between Valt and Lui continues; one team emerges victorious.

40.SummaryEnglish: A strange scientist offers to measure Valt's launching technique before the National Individual Tournament begins.

41.SummaryEnglish: Valt competes against mad scientist Naoki in the first round of individual competition.

42.SummaryEnglish: Shu faces an opponent rumored to be underhanded.

43.SummaryEnglish: Zac has competition for the love of his fans; Valt has a rematch with Quon.

44.SummaryEnglish: Two beasts face each other in the second round; Gabe takes on Zac the Sunshine.

45.SummaryEnglish: Wakiya finally gets his shot at redemption when he is pitted against Shu.

46.TitleEnglish: Battle for the Top! Valt vs Xander
46.SummaryEnglish: Valt must do something he has never done before - win against Xander.

47.SummaryEnglish: Zac battles to maintain his title against an upstart pop star who looks to topple him.

48.SummaryEnglish: Valt and Zac battle to decide who will move onto the final.

49.SummaryEnglish: Shu seeks to avenge last tournament's loss to Lui and honor his promise to meet Valt in the final.

50.SummaryEnglish: At long last, the battle to determine the winner of the National Individual Tournament begins.

51.SummaryEnglish: The best Blader in the country will finally be decided.

1.SummaryEnglish: After being scouted by the world-renowned Beyblade team BC Sol, Valt Aoi arrives in Spain, where he meets a boy named.

2.SummaryEnglish: After missing his first day at BC Sol, Valt must beat the fierce competition to earn his spot on the team. At tryouts, he reunites with a buddy from back home.

3.SummaryEnglish: With a match against Sunbat United coming up, BC Sol hosts internal tryouts to select their squad.

4.SummaryEnglish: Thousands of miles away from home, Valt and Rantaro get the chance to face off against a familiar face. They're both excited to show off their Beys' new abilities, but Valtryek and Roktavor aren't the only ones to have evolved.

5.SummaryEnglish: BC Sol and Sunbat United lock horns in a friendly match, but the action is anything but. Valt may have gone up against Silas Karlisle before, but he's never seen him launch like this.

6.SummaryEnglish: Honcho gets a second chance to take down an old rival. Meanwhile, veteran BC Sol Bladers start to feel the squeeze when they notice how quickly Valt and Rantaro are rising through the ranks.

7.SummaryEnglish: After a teammate's sudden departure, Valt finds himself in the middle of flaring tensions between new and old BC Sol members. Kris and Trad hold tryouts to decide which Bladers will make it on the first string.

8.SummaryEnglish: The European League is well underway. Valt finds a new friend who is full of laughs and positive vibes, but when they're teams are forced to compete against one another, friendship quickly fades.

9.SummaryEnglish: An old friend tunes in to the face-off between BC Sol and Top Wand. Valt gets a second chance to challenge a new foe. Behind the scenes, a bold offer is put on the table that risks changing BC Sol forever.

10.SummaryEnglish: Valt and Rantaro celebrate their rising world rankings, but tension begins to brew within the club.

11.SummaryEnglish: A revamp finds Valt and Rantaro moving up to BC Sol's first string. A missing key member results in a less than desirable losing streak. The team hopes to turn their luck around.

12.SummaryEnglish: The current captain of the AS Gallus, Daigo, is an old friend of Valt and Rantaro's. Valt and Rantaro get a chance to check out Doomscizor's new skills prior to match. Unfortunately, their curiosity is misinterpreted by the management team at BC Sol.

13.SummaryEnglish: Friends turn rivals as BC Sol comes up against AS Gallus in battle, in order to avoid elimination.

14.SummaryEnglish: BC Sol's next opponent reveals a secret weapon.

15.SummaryEnglish: The threat of Ghasem and Garuda; Valt finds Valtryek's hidden power.

16.SummaryEnglish: When Shu disappears without a trace, Wakiya helps Valt and his friends track him down in Mexico; along the way, they meet an old friend.

17.SummaryEnglish: Valt, Rantaro, Wakiya, Daigo, and Cuza discover a secretive underground training facility and a newly-evolved Spryzen; hot on Shu's trail, they'll have to challenge a group of masked Bladers.

18.SummaryEnglish: Daigo, Cuza, and Valt go head-to-head with their copycats in the Snake Pit.

19.SummaryEnglish: Wakiya faces his biggest fear; Red Eye makes good on his promise.

20.SummaryEnglish: A surprise Blader transfers to BC Sol; Stan feels overlooked.

21.SummaryEnglish: When a movie is shot near BC Sol, Valt and his friends are thrilled to be a part of it. But the best part is the main character is one of the Big 5, the 5 greatest bladers in the world.

22.SummaryEnglish: The movie shoot continues; Wakiya challenges Joshua to a bey battle.

23.SummaryEnglish: With Trad gone, BC Sol needs a new BeyTrainer. Luckily, Valt has a familiar face in mind.

24.SummaryEnglish: With the World League just around the corner, Joshua and Valt dig into the mystery of Free.

25.SummaryEnglish: After BC Sol's first round thrashing, Valt receives a letter from Xander, about how he tries to get into SB Rios by taking on the Hundred Blader Challenge with his newly evolved bey, Siege Xcalius.

26.SummaryEnglish: As the second round of the World League approaches, Valt tries to master his newest move; the second round begins against a familiar foe.

27.SummaryEnglish: Valt, along with numerous other friends and familiar faces return to Japan for the battle between Sunbat United and SB Rios.

28.SummaryEnglish: On their way to Daigo's match against BC Galleon, Cuza finds a old friend, one he is afraid of!

29.SummaryEnglish: BC Sol travels to Brazil for the BeyCarnival and the semifinal against SB Rios. But when they accidentally ruin the parade, the Brazilians threaten to riot against them. To solve this, Ren Wu, one of the Big 5, challenges Valt, Rantaro, and Cuza to a 3 on 1 battle.

30.SummaryEnglish: The semi-finals of the World League begin.

31.SummaryEnglish: BC Sol and AS Gallus each find themselves in need of a comeback in the semi-finals.

32.SummaryEnglish: Daigo faces Joshua Burns; Valt and Xander's battle heats up.

33.SummaryEnglish: BC Sol and the Raging Bulls battle for the title of World League Champions; a familiar face from the Snake Pit makes an appearance.

34.SummaryEnglish: Free and Silas face off as the World League continues.

35.SummaryEnglish: Silas and Joshua go head-to-head in the final match to decide the champions of the World League.

36.SummaryEnglish: Red Eye and Lui's duel leads to an unexpected revelation.

37.SummaryEnglish: The BC Sol crew finds out about a tournament that will decide the best blader in the world.

38.SummaryEnglish: An old friend returns to BC Sol, causing some deep-rooted tensions to bubble up.

39.SummaryEnglish: After arriving in America, Valt discovers an underground Blading ring ruled by a former world champion.

40.SummaryEnglish: The International Bladers' Cup officially opens and Valt prepares to take on the emperor Kurt Baratier.

41.SummaryEnglish: Shu and Boa settle the score; Cuza faces a new threat in Norman Tarver and Twin Noctemis.

42.SummaryEnglish: Silas and Xander meet in the stadium; Valtryek approaches a new level of evolution.

43.SummaryEnglish: Shu shows off the power of Spryzen Requiem in a battle against Kurt and Boom Khalzar.

44.SummaryEnglish: Valt tackles the Snake Pit's Norman Tarver.

45.SummaryEnglish: The winners are separated from the losers in the fourth round; Valt finally gets to battle Shu.

46.SummaryEnglish: Kris tells Valt a secret; Free pushes himself in an attempt to defeat Lui.

47.SummaryEnglish: The match between Free and Lui heats up; Valt must master Valtryek's new gear.

48.SummaryEnglish: Valt needs Cuza to beat Kurt in order to stay in the competition.

49.SummaryEnglish: Four Bladers compete in the semifinals of the International Bladers Cup.

50.SummaryEnglish: Valt faces his teammate Free. Soon enough, Wakiya brings Daigo, Ken, and Valt's family to help him with his training as the finals to the International Blader's Cup get closer.

51.SummaryEnglish: Valt continues to battle Shu in order to free him from Spryzen's control with the world title and their friendship on the line.

1.SummaryEnglish: After two years as World Champion, Valt is ready to take Valtryek to the next level: Turbo! On his journey, Valt meets Aiger Akabane. With no experience but a natural talent that rivals Valt’s, Aiger creates his own Turbo Bey, Z Achilles. It looks like a new Blader is ready to take center stage!

2.SummaryEnglish: Determined to grow stronger and battle the best, Aiger transfers to Beigoma Academy. His sights are set on battling Valt’s successor, Fubuki Sumiye. But after almost 100 consecutive wins, will Aiger have enough gas left in the tank to take on the Bey Club Captain?

3.SummaryEnglish: The match between Aiger and Fubuki continues. Aiger learns he isn’t the only Akabane sibling at Beigoma Academy when he finds out his little sister, Naru, is transferring too! Meanwhile, Ranjiro Kiyama, captain of the Wild Bey Gang, decides to battle Aliger and test his skills for himself.

4.SummaryEnglish: Valt and Kurt Baratier battle and as word spreads about Aiger's strength, he gets another shot at Fubuki.

5.SummaryEnglish: When Lui challenges Valt, in the first round, his dragon scream bursts Valtryek, however, Valtryek then bursts Luinor.In the third round, the bey stadium cracks and Valt Aoi keeps his title with the stalemate.

6.SummaryEnglish: The winner of the Luinor Cup will be crowned All-Asia Champion. Lui challenges three stubborn Bladers to a one-on-three battle.

7.SummaryEnglish: After his loss to Lui, Aiger decides to step up his training and creates something that takes everyone by surprise.

8.SummaryEnglish: After witnessing the power of Fubuki’s new Turbo Bey, Suoh turns to a mysterious family heirloom to create one of his own.

9.SummaryEnglish: In an unlucky draw, Toko is up against Shu in his first battle of the tournament. Having recently seen Shu’s power for themselves, Aiger, Fubuki, and Cap’n train with Toko to prepare for his match.

10.SummaryEnglish: Aiger and Ranjiro are against each other, and the winner advances to the semi-finals.

11.SummaryEnglish: The match ups of the semifinals are announced! Fubuki is forced to face an old friend, while Aiger has to face a new one. It’s Fubuki the hard-worker against Suoh the genius.

12.SummaryEnglish: While Aiger is excited to face off against his friend, Hae-jin is torn between Blading and archery; Fubuki extends an olive branch to Suoh.

13.SummaryEnglish: The Lúinor Cup finals arrive; Fubuki makes a big decision.

14.SummaryEnglish: Before training with Cap'n and Hae-jin, Aiger must deal with a fortuneteller.

15.SummaryEnglish: Aiger suffers a major setback during his battle with Lui.

16.SummaryEnglish: Aiger must battle Valt Aoi on board a battleship with just two Turbo 4 members.

17.SummaryEnglish: Aiger, Hae-Jin, and Cap'n hop aboard the Battleship Cruise. Aiger will have to face off against friend and foe if he wants a shot at battling World Champion, Valt Aoi. But with two members of the Turbo 4 on board, this is set to be his hardest challenge yet.

18.TitleEnglish: Ghost Ship! Adventure on the High Seas!
18.SummaryEnglish: The Bladers investigate an abandoned ship, while a mysterious figure watches their every move.

19.SummaryEnglish: The masked Blader joins the crew; Xavier takes his rivalry with Aiger to the next level; Phi continues to reveal Phoenix's powers.

20.SummaryEnglish: Aiger winds up in the Raging Bulls gym; the ninjas get a taste of Phi's power as a new Blader arrives.

21.SummaryEnglish: The Bladers get a chance at redemption with a tag-team battle.

22.SummaryEnglish: Ranjiro, Suoh, and Hae-jin risk it all to stay in the competition; Kyle loses more than a battle.

23.SummaryEnglish: Fubuki and Suoh battle each other for survival after months of training.

24.SummaryEnglish: Aiger, Xavier and Laban wind up stranded on a deserted island; with the competition spiraling out of control, more Bladers are sent home.

25.SummaryEnglish: Naru has an encounter with her dad's former mentor; Aiger challenges Free De La Hoya to a battle.

26.SummaryEnglish: With the departure of Xavier, just four Bladers remain in the competition; Aiger struggles to harness the power of Achilles.

27.SummaryEnglish: Xavier introduces Aiger to Xander Shakadera, to prepare him for the title match.

28.SummaryEnglish: Aiger and Valt Aoi face off for the World Championship title.

29.SummaryEnglish: After defeating Valt, Aiger faces another important opponent.

30.SummaryEnglish: As Hyde's predicted victory looms closer, it looks like Aiger might lose his title as quickly as he won it; after the match, training with the Bey Club devolves into a one-sided burst-fest.

31.SummaryEnglish: Aiger's frustration is growing and Hyde's press conference only makes things worse; Kyle appears to take his shot against the famous Free De La Hoya.

32.SummaryEnglish: Aiger and Ranjiro arrive at the Dread Tower, but with Hyde calling the shots, nothing is as it seems; with the grand entrance of notorious Bey-burglar, Count Nightfell, things are about to get even more unpredictable.

33.SummaryEnglish: As they make their way through the Dread Tower, Aiger and Ranjiro find themselves in a sticky situation when they face off against the enigmatic Dr. Evel.

34.SummaryEnglish: Aiger is challenged to a friendly match by Count Nightfell, and he is sure he'll win.

35.SummaryEnglish: Fubuki and Shu Kurenai show up at the Dread Tower, and Shu is determined to show Aiger where true strength comes from.

36.SummaryEnglish: The Hyde show continues as Aiger finally gets his long-awaited rematch. But the battles don’t stop there; former and current World Champions go head-to-head when Valt challenges Hyde.

37.TitleEnglish: Turbo Clash! Showdown at the Dark Citadel!
37.SummaryEnglish: it’s time for Valt to prove once and for all who belongs in the top spot as he clashes with Hyde in a Dread Tower showdown. Frustrated by his earlier loss to Hyde, Aiger storms out of the match and runs into Phi.

38.SummaryEnglish: Aiger might have hit rock bottom, but that means the only way to go is up! With a little help from Shu Kurenai, he returns home to forge his new Bey: Turbo Achilles.

39.SummaryEnglish: An old friend of Valt’s arrives in town: the one-and-only Master of the Wind, Kit Lopez! With Aiger struggling to perfect his Turbo Awakening, Kit helps him come up with a Plan B to take Hyde down.

40.TitleEnglish: Master of the Wind! Air Knight!
40.SummaryEnglish: Achilles finally entered the Turbo Awakened state against Hyde and Hades, but can Aiger repeat his success? If he wants to stand a chance against the Master of Wind, Kit Lopez, he'll have to deepen his bond with Achilles. But with Kit's Air Knight taking to the skies, will their Turbo Awakening be enough?

41.SummaryEnglish: Phi comes out of nowhere to challenge Hyde, his younger brother. Knowing that in Dread Tower, first burst gets the win, he provokes Hyde to be tired and gets fired up by evil aura and destroys Dread Hades.Then he makes his phoenix bind with hades and gets his new bey Dread Phoenix.

42.SummaryEnglish: Beigoma academy's principal surprises the young ones by introducing the six-way battle royale stadium. Suoh Genji makes an unexpected appearance and challenges Aiger's new Turbo Achilles.Moreover Valt's younger brother Toko Aoi seems fired up.

43.SummaryEnglish: Phi, after successfully taking over his younger brother Hearts' Dead hades ,makes his phoenix bind with hades and gets his new bey Dead Phoenix. He claims to be the god of destruction and makes his first target Free de la hoya. He has had a battle with Free and destroys Geist Fafnir into pieces.

44.SummaryEnglish: Aigar sets out on a training journey to build his bond with Achilles, and his first destination is Xhan's royal palace. At reuniting with Aigar, Xhan quickly takes him through various training exercises. Tile splitting, karate exercises, balance training - Aigar challenges the activities Xhan does on a daily basis. As the pair face off in a stadium built for those specializing in attack, Xhan detects some hesitation within Aigar. What's holding him back!?

45.TitleEnglish: Turbo Training! Survival on the Savanna!
45.SummaryEnglish: Aiger's training journey takes him to Africa where he meets with an old friend, wild child Laban Vanot. Laban shows Aiger the importance of concentration and following your senses; a lesson which, after a deep conversation with Achilles, Aiger’s ready to master. Meanwhile, Valt and Kit face off in the next Title Match!

46.SummaryEnglish: It's Phi vs Shu! After witnessing Geist Fafnir's destruction, Shu believes it's his duty to stop the terrifying Phi once and for all. Not one to go in without a plan, Shu focuses on ending the match quickly before Dread Phoenix can use its ultimate weapon. Can Shu's determination overcome Phi's appetite for destruction?

47.TitleEnglish: Spirit of Flame vs Lord of Destruction!
47.SummaryEnglish: It's Phi vs Shu; After witnessing Geist Fafnir's destruction, Shu believes it's his duty to stop Phi once and for all; Not one to go in without a plan, Shu focuses on ending the match quickly before Dread Phoenix can use its ultimate weapon.

48.SummaryEnglish: As Aiger trains for his impending battle against Phi, Shu arrives with a re-forged Spryzen to lend a hand. Meanwhile, Toko unites the Bey Club and the Wild Bey Gang to try and find Phi’s weakness—if he has one. Aiger’s going to need everyone’s help to hone his skills for this showdown!

49.SummaryEnglish: Ahead of their showdown, Aiger fears that Phi may once again succeed in destroying Achilles. And when it’s declared that the match will be decided by Burst Finish only, it looks like Aiger’s plans for a defense-based strategy might prove useless. Will all of his training come undone before the battle even begins?

50.SummaryEnglish: Despite a string of Ring Out and Survivor Finishes, the score is still stuck at 0-0! With the crowd on his side, Aiger follows his intuition and listens to Achilles. In this final epic encounter, he resolves to show Phi the true meaning of the bond between Blader and Bey!

51.SummaryEnglish: Aiger reflects on his journey and the two constants that have been with him since the start: his bond with Achilles and his rivalry with Valt. As strong as he’s become, Aiger will still have to step it up if he’s going to take on the World Champ! Who will claim the title of the world’s best Blader?

1.SummaryEnglish: After training with Valt Aoi, Dante Koryu is ready to take on the world with his new Bey, Ace Dragon!

2.SummaryEnglish: While training, Dante stumbles across a high-tech gym run by the Spark Wings. One battle is all it takes to show why this club, and their leader Fumiya Kindo, are the Victories' biggest rivals!

3.SummaryEnglish: In an attempt to humiliate the Victories, Fumiya challenges Dante to a battle that will be broadcast around the country.

4.SummaryEnglish: Blading superstar Valt Aoi visits Dante for a friendly battle before opening the Bey Carnival. Once the tournament begins, the Victories will need to get the hang of the Hyper Stadium if they hope to win.

5.SummaryEnglish: As the Bey Carnival heats up, Arman and Ashindra take the stage against Joe Lazure and Joker. Will they meet the same fate as the other Victories members before them?

6.SummaryEnglish: In the Bey Carnival semifinals, Dante clashes with Joe while Fumiya goes up against Lodin. The battles have never been wilder and the stakes have never been higher!

7.SummaryEnglish: At last, the final match of the Bey Carnival is here! If Dante wants to beat elite athlete Lodin Haijima, he'll need to make his launch way more powerful!

8.SummaryEnglish: Dante and Delta are finally going head-to-head! Dante is excited to battle his friend, but Delta is disappointed by Dante's performance.

9.SummaryEnglish: Tango decides to take the Victories on a training journey to battle more powerful Bladers. While Dante meets with the mysterious Pheng Hope, Delta challenges the artistic Blindt DeVoy.

10.SummaryEnglish: Delta and Blindt decide who'll walk away the victor, while Pheng takes the Victories back to his temple so that Arman can make good on his promise.

11.SummaryEnglish: Dante and Arman compete in the Blading circuit at Battle Island. They'll be going up against the best Bladers from all around the world, but the ultimate test will be against none other than the legendary Aiger Akabane!

12.SummaryEnglish: Dante wants to be the first Blader to finish the Battle Island race and face off against World Champ, Aiger Akabane. There's just one problem: he's up against Blindt DeVoy of the Risen 3!

13.SummaryEnglish: Fresh off their recent victories, Dante, Arman and Delta are the final Bladers left to face reigning world champion Aiger Akabane and claim the title for themselves.

14.SummaryEnglish: In the wake of a devastating Burst Finish, Dante's only got one more shot to take down Aiger Akabane. Can Dante stage a comeback? Only the next battle will tell

15.SummaryEnglish: A mysterious Blader named Arthur has interrupted the final match of the Battle Island circuit, announcing a new Blading age built on darkness and power. Now, as the official World Champion, Aiger must face Arthur to keep the world of Beyblade from falling into despair!

16.SummaryEnglish: Dante struggles to rebuild Dragon after his devastating defeat. With Arthur's twisted style of Blading taking over the world, Dante is running out of time!

17.SummaryEnglish: With the completion of Royal Genesis, Gwyn lets it rip in battle for the very first time! Dante offers some friendly advice, but how will a total newbie fare against a Blader as experienced as Joe Lazure?

36.TitleEnglish: Put to The Test! Unburstable Bey!

2.TitleEnglish: Beys of The Sun! Hyperion and Helios!

8.TitleEnglish: Meet the Monster: Free De La Hoya!

10.TitleEnglish: Attack Not Good!? Attack Not Good!!

12.TitleEnglish: Shirasagijo x The Mythological Island of Demons!

17.TitleEnglish: Is This a Dream?! Or Is It a Nightmare?!

23.TitleEnglish: Hyuga and Lain vs. Hikaru and Aiger!

25.TitleEnglish: A True Hero! Tag Battle Style!

28.TitleEnglish: Strongest and Unbeatable vs. The New Generation!

38.TitleEnglish: It Begins! Legend Super Tag League!

41.TitleEnglish: Crash and Clash! Battle of Legends!

47.TitleEnglish: We Can Do It! Or Maybe Not!

50.TitleEnglish: Surpass Your Limits! Defeat the Legends!

52.TitleEnglish: Break Through Our Limits! Our Flare!

1.TitleEnglish: The Dark Prince! And Destruction Belfyre!

7.TitleEnglish: Theater of the Abyss! Bel vs. Valt!

13.TitleEnglish: Flipping the Script! Belfyre vs. Fafnir!

17.TitleEnglish: Lift Off! The Great Aerial Tour!

18.TitleEnglish: Earthquake at the Sacred Grounds! Battle of Beigoma Academy!

20.TitleEnglish: The Crimson Super Star: Astral Spriggan!

21.TitleEnglish: The Dark Prince Strikes! Bel vs. Free!

23.TitleEnglish: Dark Prince One Day! Minion the Next!

26.TitleEnglish: Prince vs Prince! Darkness and Light!

28.TitleEnglish: The Decisive Aerial Battle! Dynamite Battle!

29.TitleEnglish: The Dark Prince Returns! Devastate Belfyre!

30.TitleEnglish: The Supreme King of Light's Descent!

32.TitleEnglish: Demon King vs. Supreme King! The Deciding Battle for the Strongest Team!

35.TitleEnglish: The Demon King, Leaves the Team!?

40.TitleEnglish: High and Low! The Hybrid Stadium!

46.TitleEnglish: Scorching-Hot! Battle with the Supreme King!

1.SummaryEnglish: The Grand Masquerade Bey Tournament is here! But where is here? Well, Bladers from all across the globe have gathered at a mysterious “Power Spot” overflowing with elemental energy and they’re gonna do what Bladers do best: Let it Rip! After he finds his way into the heart of this Power Spot, Bel faces off with the masked Blader Quadra and her elemental Bey, Pandora. How will the Dark Prince fare against this new type of Blading?

2.SummaryEnglish: Ever since his loss to Quadra, Bel can’t get the mysterious masked Blader off his mind. Dreaming: Quadra. Eating: Quadra. Even when he’s facing Ranzo, Bel sees Quadra. This doesn’t sit right with Ranzo, who threatens to exit the Theater of the Abyss, stage left. In the chaos, the Dark Prince evolves Belfyre and Quadra appears at Phantom’s Gate to give him a chance at revenge. But what is she really up to?

3.SummaryEnglish: World-class Blader and loveable goofball, Dante Koryu has arrived at Phantom’s Gate to challenge the Dark Prince. But he’s not the only one! Pax has ordered Quadra to Battle Bel once again so he can gather more information on Pandora’s rising Elemental Power.

4.SummaryEnglish: To escape the chaos at Phantom’s Gate, Pri and Hanna have a sleepover at the Suiro house. Hanna’s excited to tell Pri all about her family, which brings up some old memories. When they return, Pri finds a special Blading delivery from her brother overseas, just in time for the Theater of the Abyss to throw a new tournament!

5.SummaryEnglish: Pri removes her mask to reveal herself as the enigmatic Quadra. This revelation shocks everyone at Phantom’s Gate, but her brother’s not too impressed. Pax tells Pri to keep her mask on while battling or else risk ruining their research data. But what’s the big deal? Mask or no mask, it shouldn’t matter, right?

6.SummaryEnglish: Bel, Ranzo, and Hanna come across a puppet show that offers all the classics: a princess, a prince, a space invasion, and, even, a Bey tournament! And it turns out that the Blader they need to defeat is none other than Beigoma Academy alum, Ken Midori. While Bel and Ranzo go up against the three-headed guard dog, Pri learns how he handles his dual-persona of puppeteer and Blader.

7.TitleEnglish: Theater of the Dark Prince! Monstrous Missions!
7.SummaryEnglish: Ken’s got a bunch of training exercises for Bel, Ranzo, and Pri that’ll hone their skills for both puppetry as well as Blading! And when training’s over, it’s time to Battle! Which Blader has picked up the most from their monstrous missions? And will it be enough to make their puppet show a smash hit?

8.SummaryEnglish: Valt’s back at Phantom’s Gate with an offer: does anyone want to face off with his super-powerful friend? Who wouldn’t?! So, Bel, Pri, and Ranzo make their way to the Shakadera family dojo just as the mystery Blader completes a 300 Blader challenge. Does anyone have what it takes to defeat this Beyblade titan!?

9.SummaryEnglish: Can Bel, Pri, and Ranzo keep up with the Shakadera training regimen? Only one way to find out! And after all their jumping across rivers, dodging swinging tree trunks, and even the classic carry-a-tire-up-a-staircase, they’ll need to keep something in the tank, because then it’s time to face Xander in a one-on-one battle! Ranzo’s confident he’s got what it takes but Pri’s seen something in the forest that might give her an edge!

10.SummaryEnglish: Bel and Xander’s showdown has been put on hold while the Bladers take a quick snack break. Luckily, Jiji comes to the rescue with his signature scrumptious feast. But when Bel declares feasts like this just ‘one of the perks’ of being the Dark Prince, Xander presents him with a challenge: whoever wins their battle gets Jiji to stay with them! Is this any other battle or is there a lesson for Bel?

11.SummaryEnglish: What exactly is a battle camp? Well, Bel, Ranzo, and Pri are about to find out because they’ve been invited to Battle Island where rookie Bladers from all over have gathered to train and compete! When they arrive, they meet a pair of brothers named Hikaru and Hyuga Hizashi. Obviously everyone wants to battle, but Wakiya’s got a few rules they’ll need to follow first.

12.SummaryEnglish: Training at the battle camp is not letting up, and some Bladers have more trouble following Wakiya’s rules than others. Exhibit A through Z: Bel goes off script, declaring a rematch with his new rival Hyuga. Meanwhile, Pax arrives at Battle Island with a special delivery for Pri. What did Pax bring and why does he know some of the Blading legends?

13.SummaryEnglish: It’s the climax of Wakiya’s battle camp and so the assembled Bladers get to participate in a Tag-Team tournament! Some pairs, like the Hizashi brothers, are already skilled at Battling as a team. But others…not so much! Can the Dark Prince and Quadra figure out how to work together or will some other pair win the duel?

14.SummaryEnglish: Breaking news: Aiger Akabane’s arrived at Phantom’s Gate! Bel’s ready for a battle but Aiger only wants to challenge Valt. Luckily for the Dark Prince, Valt’s not around so Aiger has no choice but to test out the new Achilles on him. Unluckily for the Dark Prince, there’s a condition: if he wants to battle the world champ, Bel will have to join forces with Pri!

15.SummaryEnglish: Skilled Bladers from all over the globe were chosen to compete in the Champion’s Challenge Tournament, including Valt’s fellow BC Sol Blader, Kit Lopez. Who will win the right to challenge the world champ, Aiger Akabane? There’s only one way to find out!

16.SummaryEnglish: The Champion’s Challenge Tournament keeps on spinning, but one important face is missing: the Dark Prince is nowhere to be seen! Wakiya has officially disqualified Bel with absolutely no hope of ever, ever, ever re-entering. Ever. But with the crowd, Hanami, and even a few Blading legends calling for his return, Bel might just have a shot!

17.SummaryEnglish: Something monumental was found hidden deep beneath the Grand Masquerade Bey Tournament’s stage and it might just change the face of Blading forever. Luckily, Shu Kurenai’s there to help with the discovery and to call in Valt for a second opinion. As a researcher of all things elemental and a fan of Shu’s old alter-ego, Red Eye, Pax follows along to offer his own insights.

18.SummaryEnglish: It’s the final stage of the Champion’s Challenge and the pressure is on when Pax gives Pri some strict instructions on how to use Pandora. His tactics might help her win but they don’t really give Pri the freedom to Blade her own way. When Quadra takes on the Dark Prince, will she battle the way Pax wants, or the way she wants?

19.SummaryEnglish: Kit and Bel are set to face off for the chance to challenge Aiger. Having already lost to the Dark Prince, Pri can’t stand to see Bel lose again so she steps in as unofficial coach. Sure, it might be for her pride’s sake as much as his, but who’s counting? Meanwhile, Kit gets some advice from Blading legends like Valt and Aiger. When it comes time for Bel and Kit to face off, everyone has something to prove!

20.SummaryEnglish: The big day has finally arrived! Bel has climbed his way to the top and earned the right to challenge Aiger for a chance to become the world champion. Beys and Elements will collide in this epic title match! Does the Dark Prince have what it takes to snatch the crown and reign supreme or will Aiger show everyone why they call him invincible?

21.SummaryEnglish: Pax Forsythe has returned to the Blading stage with a vengeance and with a new Bey. But Pax isn’t the only one with a new partner! Inspired by his loss against Aiger, Bel has evolved Belfyre into something stronger than ever before. When word gets out about Pax’s return, who will be brave enough to challenge his Ruin Pandemonium and its ultimate Elemental Power?

22.SummaryEnglish: Wakiya stuns the world by suddenly announcing a new event. The Lodestar Battle Tournament has everything expected of a Beyblade competition: top-tier Bladers, high stakes, and all the bursts you can imagine! But figuring out who will get to enter will be a challenge in and of itself!

23.SummaryEnglish: The Hizashi brothers vroom-vroom their way into the Lodestar Battle Tournament! Hikaru sees defeating the legendary Valt Aoi as a way to cement his own status as a hero. While Hyuga wants nothing more than to “ka-blam” the Dark Prince! But the brothers are facing evolved forms of Valtryek and Belfyre. Will they be able to overcome the odds?

24.TitleEnglish: Achilles vs. Pandemonium! Clashes of Light!
24.SummaryEnglish: Aiger faces off against Pax in the the Lodestar Battle Tournament. It’s Resonance against Elemental Power in a clash of two out-of-this-world talented Bladers! But as the battle rages on, Pax’s desperation and obsession starts to make Shu and some of the other legends nervous.

25.SummaryEnglish: Pri just can’t believe what Pax is willing to do to unleash the greatest elemental power possible. Worried, she tries her best to focus on defeating Valt Aoi. With the help of the Dark Prince, Pri takes her launch power to new heights. But is that enough to take down the Legend of Legends?

26.SummaryEnglish: Bel’s preparing for his semi-final match against Pax. Pax has been so intense lately that even the Dark Prince is getting a teensy bit scared. Scary or not, Pax’s elemental power is set to clash with Bel’s ‘Dark Prince’ power. A fierce Battle is gathering and it’s sure to remind everyone why they love Blading!
